meanings.definition: Situated or occurring within the cranium.
meanings.sent1: The intracranial pressure was carefully monitored after the surgery.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained the intracranial bleeding to the patient's family.
meanings.sent3: The intracranial puzzle was challenging but fun to solve.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts felt intracranial, swirling around inside her head.
meanings.sent5: The intracranial echo of his laughter lingered in the room.

meanings.definition: Relating to the inside of the skull.
meanings.sent1: The intracranial examination revealed no abnormalities.
meanings.sent2: The surgeon discussed the intracranial anatomy with the medical students.
meanings.sent3: The intracranial secrets of the ancient skull fascinated the archaeologists.
meanings.sent4: His dreams seemed to come from an intracranial source, deep within his mind.
meanings.sent5: The intracranial pressure felt like a weight pressing down on his thoughts.
